Jean-Claude Roger Mbede (nwụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 2014) bụ nwoke Cameroon nke a mara ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ atọ maka ebubo nke ndina ụdị onwe na ịnwa ndina ụdị onwe
Ndị otu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ n'ụwa niile gụnyere Human Rights Watch na Amnesty International mere mkpesa banyere ikpe ya, nke ikpeazụ kpọrọ ya onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche.

N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2011, ndị ọrụ nchekwa nke onye odeakwụkwọ nke steeti Cameroon (SED) jidere Mbede mgbe o zigara ozi SMS na-ahazi izute onye ọ maara nwoke. Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ UK The Guardian si kwuo, SED "na-elekwasị anya ma na-ekpe ndị ikom na-edina nwoke ibe ha ikpe" n'okpuru iwu ntaramahụhụ Nkebi 347a: "Onye ọ bụla na onye nwere mmekọahụ na onye nwoke na nwanyị ga-ata ahụhụ site na ọnwa isii ruo afọ ise na ịkwụ ụgwọ site na 20,000 CFA Francs ruo 200,000 CFA". E jidere Mbede otu izu na "ihe a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ nwoke idina nwoke" na Yaoundé tupu ebubo ebubo "ị idina nwoke ma nwaa idina nwoke idina nwanyị" na 9 Machị.
Onye nnọchi anya Mbede bụ Alice Nkom, onye ọka iwu a ma ama na-ahụ maka ikike LGBT na onye isi nke Cameroon's Association to Defend Homosexuals.

N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2011, a mara ya ikpe maka ebubo abụọ ahụ ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Kondengui Central. Human Rights Watch mere mkpesa banyere ikpe ya, bụ ndị kọwara ya dị ka "nnukwu mmebi nke ikike Mbede nwere nnwere onwe ikwu okwu na ịha nhata" ma kpọọ gọọmentị Cameroon ka ha wepụ iwu ahụ dị mkpa.

Amnesty International weputara ịdọ aka ná ntị n'aha Mbede, na onye na-ekwuchitere ya na-ekwu, sị: "Ichebe mmadụ maka ezi omume mmekọahụ ha ma ọ bụ nke a na-eche na ọ bụ omume mmekọahụ bụ mmebi iwu siri ike ma ekwesighi ikwe ka ọ bụrụ n'okpuru iwu ntaramahụhụ nke mba ọ bụla". Onye nduzi Africa nke Amnesty International Erwin var der Borght kwuru, "Jean-Claude Mbede bụ onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche e jidere naanị n'ihi na ọ na-eche na ọ bụ mmekọahụ
A ga-ewepụ ebubo niile e boro ya ma hapụ ya ozugbo. Ọtụtụ alaka Amnesty International na-anakọta mbinye aka na-achọ ka a tọhapụ ya.

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011, Nkom kwuru na Mbede nwere nsogbu nri na-edozi ahụ na mwakpo mmekọahụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ. E mere ndokwa ka a nụ arịrịọ ya n'ụbọchị 5 n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2012, mana e yigharịrị ya. A tọhapụrụ ya nwa oge n'ụbọchị 16 n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012.
Mbede dị afọ iri atọ na anọ nwụrụ na 10 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2014 n'obodo ya Ngoumou mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọgwụ n'ihi na ọ nweghị ego maka nlekọta ahụike.
